Render a define document for sending to FDA

render_fda_define.Rd

Render a define document for sending to FDA

render_fda_define(x, ...)

# S3 method for yproj
render_fda_define(x, ...)

# S3 method for character
render_fda_define(x, stem = "define",
  title = "Data Definitions", date = format(Sys.time()),
  author = "MetrumRG Staff Scientist", output_dir = getwd(),
  build_dir = tempdir(), ...)

Arguments

x

a yaml specification file name or a yproj object
...

passed to rmarkdown::render
stem

used to name the output document
title

a title for the document
date

the document date
author

the document author
output_dir

passed to rmarkdown::render
build_dir

directory where rmarkdown will build the document

Examples

proj_file <- file_proj_ex()

proj_file
#> [1] "/Users/kyleb/ghe/software/yspec/inst/spec/project.yml"

render_fda_define(proj_file)
